titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 1098) to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to authorize borrowers to separate joint consolidation loans; and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 1098) to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to authorize borrowers to separate joint consolidation loans; and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 117-478, by Mr. Perlmutter.
Resolution also provides one motion to commit.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 100.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1361.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H. Res. 1361, the Chair put the question on the previous question and by voice vote, announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mrs. Fischbach demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings until a time to be announced.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 206 (Roll no. 441).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 205 (Roll no. 442).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution sets forth the rule for consideration of S. 1098.
